casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. ALLEN
v.
INDUS. COMM. 2018-0910 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 26, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. On respondent's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. Relator's amended motion to strike motion to dismiss and relator's motion for relief denied as moot.
